title: remake problems since the latest patch
body: Since the last patch am I the only one having problems loading games ? I couldnt connect my self to the game because the game didnt launch itself and lost 2 games cause of remake. I was wondering if I was the only one.

replies.body: You're probably not the only one having issues, as there's quite a few things that can go wrong with someones network at any given time. If you haven't been able to connect to any games whatsoever, there might be some kind of issue with how your connection is being routed to our servers. Let's check that out first by running a traceroute with [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to our EUW servers at 192.64.170.252. Paste what it gives back here so I can go over it with you!

Same happens to me omg, 6 games in a row and all remake!! {{item:3070}}
I've got 5, 20min leaverbuster bcuz of it!
